attributes.review: This app is just outrageously HORRIBLE! It made my phone glitch and overheat!! Why is it even on the App Store??? I do not recommend the app to ANYONE! All the “information” on this app is just plain out ridiculous. I expected to be informed! But no, I got nothing but bull crap from this app! I want it off my this App Store and off the face of the earth! Who’s idiotic idea was to creat this dumb,useless,pathetic,stupid,app! I want to to be wiped away! No one should have this downloaded! AND IF ANYONE DISAGREES THEY’RE JUST AS DUMB AND STUPID! But who am I to judge anyone?? It’s not like I’m an informed person in this world! No matter what, I believe this app should be ABOLISHED!
attributes.title: Horrible!!!!

attributes.review: This application was very disappointing. It gave my phone multiple viruses and it would always crash every time I opened it. This app is a huge scam and I have reason to believe it may be stealing my personal information including my address which is completely unacceptable. Not at all the kind of quality I would expect from the president of the United States. I most definitely will be deleting this terrible app. Horrible app, I do not recommend at all. If apple keeps this app on the app store I definitely will be switching to Samsung.
attributes.title: Horrendous app extremely disappointing

attributes.title: Poopy

attributes.review: So I came on this app to find my long lost pet monkey but I realized it grew an egg on its back and hopped on an airplane and flew to China were its now the ceo of this one Burger King company and Donald Trump is one of the employees who got blew away in the same tornado that took away Alice to wonderland and that other girl to the wizard of oz and now my monkey is calling me to tell me that even in another dimension his employee Donald Trump is completely ruining his life....for one he sexually harassed my monkeys sister and deported my monkeys Hispanic cousin for no reason he also got my monkeys African American nephew arrested and brutally murdered by the police for fun. So yeah he’s a bad guy.
attributes.title: Horrible App!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in ALL hopes of learning more about the horrible man that Trump is and hear when his upcoming rallies are so that I can sign up and reserve seats, but it crashed my phone and now it runs slow and glitches 😡 Trump you owe me a new phone! Also the app wanted to know my phone number, credit card information, etc... it was getting wayyy to personal. Identify fraud is a real thing people! Don’t fall into his spell and give all your money away to an already rich man. Apple please take down this app! It’s harmful towards me and others who download it 😤
attributes.title: Crashed my new iPhone 12 🤧

attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!… Start.
attributes.title: The fitness gram pacer test...

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app I immediately was swarmed with inappropriate ads which caused me great discomfort. As if that wasn’t worse enough it proceeded to steal all my PRIVATE information and my dog. When I tried deleting the app my phone got worse and started sending messages to friends and family telling them to, well It’s too disgusting to type but i’m sure you can imagine what horrible things were sent. I had to move out if my house and get a new phone to stop the harassment I was experiencing from the creator themselves after deleting. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU HATE YOURSELF.
attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN

attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. attributes.title: Trump? More like, what a loser haha

attributes.review: At first when viewing this app, I assumed the radical democrats were creating false news. However, the second I downloaded this app, I noticed many changes within my entire family. You heard me right! This app causes family and friends who you associate with to become hypnotized and spew so many hateful words to you. Amongst many, these people were stating lyrics to the song “replay” for around 2 hours straight. This app has caused many issues in my family and I can safely say I will never buy this app again, nor do I recommend it to anyone that I know.
attributes.title: So upset

Horrible app. You are not the best person you ever ever done with you you ever have done with this app ever since you’re not gonna. Worst. App. Ever.
